entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has never flown before and is nervous about it.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who is also nervous about flying and has had many accidents even on the ground.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is almost as nervous as Neville about flying and has tried to learn from books.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a Slytherin student who receives packages of sweets from home.

relationships.description: Both Harry and Neville are nervous about flying.
Hermione is trying to help Neville with his flying skills.
Malfoy receives packages of sweets from home.
